name: @davidsneighbour/markdownlint-config
description: Markdownlint configuration for use in @davidsneighbour projects.
author: Patrick Kollitsch <davidsneighbourdev+gh@gmail.com> (https://davids-neighbour.com)

scripts.update: npm-check-updates -u && npm install && git add package* && fixpack && git commit -m "chore(deps): update dependencies"
